Package fr.uge.net.tcp.nonblocking.utils

Class ChatOSUtils

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.net.tcp.nonblocking.utils.ChatOSUtils
public class ChatOSUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class that define constants and methods used in the whole project.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int BUFFER_MAX_SIZE
    The maximum size for all buffers in this project (= 2 ^ 15).
    static int CONTENT_MAX_SIZE
    Actual maximum size of the content in an HTTP Response.
    static int HTTP_HEADER_MAX_SIZE
    The maximum size of the header in an HTTP Response. (= 100 for the actual header + 900 to leave enough space for extensions)
    static int TEXT_SIZE
    The maximum size of any text encoded in UTF-8 (i.e. pseudos, messages, resources ...)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ChatOSUtils()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.nio.ByteBuffer copyBuffer​(java.nio.ByteBuffer buff)
    Copies every data between 0 and buff.limit() inside a new buffer.
    static boolean moveData​(java.nio.ByteBuffer src, java.nio.ByteBuffer dest)
    Moves data from src to dest.
    static void silentlyClose​(java.nio.channels.Channel channel)
    Closes the channel if not already closed.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • TEXT_SIZE

      public static final int TEXT_SIZE
      The maximum size of any text encoded in UTF-8 (i.e. pseudos, messages, resources ...)
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • BUFFER_MAX_SIZE

      public static final int BUFFER_MAX_SIZE
      The maximum size for all buffers in this project (= 2 ^ 15).
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • HTTP_HEADER_MAX_SIZE

      public static final int HTTP_HEADER_MAX_SIZE
      The maximum size of the header in an HTTP Response. (= 100 for the actual header + 900 to leave enough space for extensions)
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • CONTENT_MAX_SIZE

      public static final int CONTENT_MAX_SIZE
      Actual maximum size of the content in an HTTP Response. Any content with a greater length than needed will be slitted in 2 HTTP Responses.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatOSUtils

      public ChatOSUtils()

  • Method Details

    • copyBuffer

      public static java.nio.ByteBuffer copyBuffer​(java.nio.ByteBuffer buff)
      Copies every data between 0 and buff.limit() inside a new buffer.
      Parameters:
      buff - the buffer to copy. Won't be modified during the call of this method.
      Returns:
      the new buffer in read-mode. The size of this buffer is buff.limit().

    • moveData

      public static boolean moveData​(java.nio.ByteBuffer src, java.nio.ByteBuffer dest)
      Moves data from src to dest. The quantity of data taken from src depends on the remaining of each buffer.
      Parameters:
      src - the input buffer. Must be in read-mode. Cannot be null.
      dest - the output buffer. Must be in write-mode. Cannot be null.
      Returns:
      true the output is not full.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if at least one of the buffer is null.

    • silentlyClose

      public static void silentlyClose​(java.nio.channels.Channel channel)
      Closes the channel if not already closed.
      Parameters:
      channel - the channel to close.
